com.example.my.first.app
Class DataService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      com.example.my.first.app.DataService

public class DataService
extends Service

The DataService acts as a backbone of the whole app. It checks for new SMS periodically, decodes and saves. interacts with the online database, also saving the data there. It queries the local and online database, saves the data to be plotted locally and provides it to the plotActivity when bind by it.
